content.html: The @technottingham community is the best and this year's Secret Santa has brought me so much happiness even before I opened these bad boys! I actually want to leave the house now 😂😍❤️🎁🤶 Thank you to my awesome Secret Santa! I love them 😍👟
content.value:
The @technottingham community is the best and this year's Secret Santa has brought me so much happiness even before I opened these bad boys! I actually want to leave the house now 😂😍❤️🎁🤶
Thank you to my awesome Secret Santa! I love them 😍👟

photo.alt: Photo of box of guylian chocolates and pink converse style trainers with Tech Nottingham logo embroidered on the sides
